EmailTemplate.name: 201705_APAC_Email_APACHQ30Days_ENG_mih.201705_APAC_Email_APACHQ30Days_ENG_mih_v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell International Sdn Bhd - Asia Regional Distribution Center
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
June 5, 2017
Dear Honeywell Customers
As a follow up to our letter dated May 5th, we would like to assure you that Honeywell International Sdn Bhd is successfully progressing its transition. For your information, our ASEAN headquarters office will be located at Suite 25-1, Level 25, UOA Corp Tower B, Avenue 10, The Vertical, Bangsar South City, 59200, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
The Honeywell International Sdn Bhd - Asia Regional Distribution Center will be located at Bukit Jelutong Industrial Park, Shah Alam. The date to start issuing Spares Orders to Honeywell International Sdn Bhd is on July 10, 2017. In this regard, we truly appreciate your kind validation on the activities we requested previously if have been completed. If not, we kindly ask your immediate attention to ensure that the proper actions and changes to be made as soon as possible.
CLICK HERE TO TAKE ACTION <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Honeywell-International-Sdn-Bhd.html]]>
As we go through this transition, we want to assure you that we have your best interests in mind. For frequently asked questions, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/ARDC_30Days_Letter_REV1_053017.pdf]]>. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us via your account leader or customer manager.
Thank you for your support as we work to enhance the way Honeywell Aerospace does business with you.
